geometri

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometri.AbstractForm
      • geometri.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometricalForm, java.lang.Comparable<GeometricalForm>

    public class Line
extends AbstractForm
    A class that represents a Line and have the ability to draw it on a JApplet or a JFrame.
    Author:
    Albin Bååw, Kristoffer Ek

      • Line

        public Line(int x1,
            int y1,
            int x2,
            int y2,
            java.awt.Color c)
     throws IllegalPositionException
        A Contructor that creates a line.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The start x-coordinate.
        y1 - The start y-coordinate.
        x2 - The stop x-coordinate.
        y2 - The stop y-coordinate.
        c - the color of the line.
        Throws:
        IllegalPositionException - if any of the coordinates are negative.
